All such adjustments shall take place with the rent due on January 1 of each year during the lease term. In the event that the Consumer Price Index as presently computed is discontinued as a measure of "Cost of Living" changes, any adjustment shall then be made on the basis of a comparable index then in general use as selected by LESSOR.
